Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: After those long, treacherous 4 years of sleepless nights, countless projects, and winging all those exams at Purduck University, I’ve finally made it. My dream job: A mechanical engineer at the one and only Nestla.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: The lobby looks exactly like the pictures too! I’m supposed to meet Elon Duck here to start my first day... but where is he?

Name: Eggwin
Dialogue: Hello! Sorry to keep you waiting. Are you-

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Elon Duck! Sir! It is a pleasure to finally meet... you... Where is the iconic monocle?

Name: Eggwin
Dialogue: Haha, I’m sorry to say the boss isn’t in the office today. My name Is Eggwin. I’ll be helping you on your first day here.

Name: Eggwin
Dialogue: I’m assuming you’re the new employee then. Main Duck, right?

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Quack! That’s me!

Name: Eggwin
Dialogue: Perfect, I already have your first assignment.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: An assignment already? Will I be working on the flying cars I’ve been hearing so much on the webbed?

Name: Eggwin
Dialogue: Heh, you’re getting your beak in the clouds before even flapping your wings yet. Though with a resume like yours, I’m sure you’ll be working in the manufacturing room in no time!

Name: Eggwin
Dialogue: I was going to suggest your first assignment to be introducing yourself to everyone else in the office. You’ll be working with many ducks here on a variety of projects, so I recommend getting to know them as soon as you can.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: That means... I can introduce myself to Duckette! She should be here. She updated her PeepedIn that she was also working here after graduation.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Yes, sir! I look forward to meeting everyone.

Name: Eggwin
Dialogue: Good luck! Here is a list of ducks I would like you to meet. We have quite a few... interesting ducks here, if you catch my drift. So don’t let them weird you out.

Name: Eggwin
Dialogue: I’ll be here if you either have questions or have finished your first assignment.

Name: Eggwin
Dialogue: Do you have a question?

Name: None
Dialogue: Where can I find Duckette?

Name: Eggwin
Dialogue: Duckette should be in the office room at her desk. She’s almost always on the computer.

Name: None
Dialogue: Where can I find Donald?

Name: Eggwin
Dialogue: Donald? I wouldn’t be surprised if he’s slacking in the breakroom. Maybe try checking there?

Name: None
Dialogue: Where can I find Quackson?

Name: Eggwin
Dialogue: Quackson? I rarely see that duck. I wonder where he could be hiding.

Name: None
Dialogue: I have no questions.

Name: Eggwin
Dialogue: Ok! Be sure to report back once you talk to everyone!

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: It’s her! It’s actually Duckette!

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: The ONLY other reason why I picked this job. I can’t waste my chances.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Hello Duckette! What were the odds that we both got a job at Nestla after graduation?

Name: Duckette
Dialogue: Uhh, and you are?

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: STRIKE ONE!

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Don’t you remember me? I’m Main Duck. We both went to Purduck University and studied mechanical engineering.

Name: Duckette
Dialogue: Hmm, are you sure? I don’t recall.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: STRIKE 2!

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: We were in that ME 365 together last year.

Name: Duckette
Dialogue: Oh... maybe.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: AND STRIKE 3! SHE OFFICIALLY DOES NOT REMEMBER ME!

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: H-Heh, well, I’m excited to be working with you. I hope we’re on the same project!

Name: Duckette
Dialogue: Uh ok! It was nice to meet you.

Name: Duckette
Dialogue: Oh! Did you need anything?

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: I need your number, but my beak feels like it's glued shut at the moment

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Uh... no, just saying hi.

Name: Donald
Dialogue: You the new duck?

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Yup, that’s me! My name is Main Duck.

Name: Donald
Dialogue: I would quit if I were you.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: What? Why?

Name: Donald
Dialogue: You’re just like everyone else... dreaming of working for the Elon Duck at Nestla. But everyone is disappearing, flying away like flying cars.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Uh, what do you mean that-

Name: Donald
Dialogue: We just hired someone last week. Now they’re gone. The duck we hired the week prior is gone too.

Name: Donald
Dialogue: And yesterday I could’ve sworn I saw blood in the manufacturing room. Are we really making flying cars?

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: What is this duck talking about? I should probably just leave.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Uh, I don’t know. But it was nice meeting you? I’m just gonna... go now.

Name: Donald
Dialogue: Try to stay alive duck.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: That’s not ominous at all

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Argh, I really REALLY got to use the restroom. Why are all the open stalls so dirty?!

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Let me see if this first stall is open.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: (Knocks on stall door) Hello? Anyone there?

Name: Quackson
Dialogue: What the quack are you doing? Find a different stall.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: I can’t use the other stalls! Have you seen the sorry state they’re in?

Name: Quackson
Dialogue: So? I’m busy.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Wait... is that Angry Ducks?

Name: Quackson
Dialogue: No.

Name: Quackson
Dialogue: (Flushes toilet).

Name: Quackson
Dialogue: Stall is taken!

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: ...I know.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Wow, it’s already nighttime! My first day flew by fast.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Everyone’s already gone too, even Duckette. Might as well pack up then and get ready to...

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: WAIT! Everyone is gone! That means... I have the whole office to myself! I’ve always wanted to explore the Nestla Office at night.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: I can get all the drinks I want from the vending machine, I can finally use the quacking bathroom, and I can take a peep at Duckette’s desk. And there’s no one here to stop me!

Name: Janitor
Dialogue: Please leave.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: AHH! Where did you come from?

Name: Janitor
Dialogue: Our closing time is 7:00pm. Please leave so I can clean.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Uhh well, can you make one exception? Pretty please? Just give me five minutes?

Name: Janitor
Dialogue: No. Leave or else I’ll have to kick you out.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Looks like they’re not changing their mind anytime soon. I guess they’re pretty strict with their closing hours.

Name: Main Duck
Dialogue: Fineee, have a good night.

Name: Janitor
Dialogue: Goodnight. I encourage you to remember our closing hours next time.
